Controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  Controller.Controller

public abstract class Controller
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for all the control of the game

Author:
Andreas Pattakos

Constructor Summary
Controller()
           
 
Method Summary
static void controller(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer: Controls the flow of the game and updates the GUI of the game
post-conditions: Rolls the Dice of the Player P1 and then updates his pawn and call the methods Position_Setup, end_turn, Sunday_Match.
static void end_turn(Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP, BoardGUI game)
          Observer:Ends the turn of the player whose playing
post-condition:Calls the turn_Player and calls is_Finished if the Players have finished the game.
static void get_Loan(Player P1)
          Observer: Gives the Player a Loan of 1000 euros
post-conditions: Adds 1000 to the Loan and Money of the Player P1
static void is_Finished(Player P1, Player P2)
          Observer: Sees who won the game and displays it (will be called when both players have finished the game)
post-condition: Checks which Player has the most Money after they pay their Loans and Displays the winner
static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
           
static void MyDealCards(Player P1)
          Observer: Goes through the Players Deal Cards and Displays them.
static void Position_Setup(BoardGUI game, Player P1, Player P2, Pack_of_cards PoC, Board BP)
          Observer: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player
post-condition: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player (Moves the Cards to the Players hand, finds his new MovePosition, updates the Players, infoBox and Jackpot, throws the Cards from the Players hand to the Pile)
static int[] rand(int size)
          Observer: Crates a Array with random numbers from 0 to size-1 without any duplicates and then returns it.
static void shuffle(Pack_of_cards PoC)
          Observer: Shuffles and put all the Cards from the Pile to the Main stack (Mail or Deal).
static void Start()
          observer: Takes all the necessary information from the user , initializes all the necessary Components(Players, Cards, Positions), creates the main Frame and then Starts the game
post-conditions: Asks for the Months, then creates the Pack of Cards, Player 1, Player 2, Board and BoardGUI and then Rolls Dice for both Players anf gives the first turn to the Player with the highest Dice.
static void Sunday_Match(Player P1)
          observer: Asks the player if he wants to bet for a football match if he wins it he gains 500 euros else he loses 500 euros (this method is called only when in certain positions on the board)
post-conditions: Asks the Player P1 if he wants to bet, if he wins he 500 are added to his Money if he loses 500 are removed from his Money
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

Controller

public Controller()
Method Detail

Start

public static void Start()
observer: Takes all the necessary information from the user , initializes all the necessary Components(Players, Cards, Positions), creates the main Frame and then Starts the game
post-conditions: Asks for the Months, then creates the Pack of Cards, Player 1, Player 2, Board and BoardGUI and then Rolls Dice for both Players anf gives the first turn to the Player with the highest Dice.

controller

public static void controller(Player P1,
                              Player P2,
                              Pack_of_cards PoC,
                              Board BP,
                              BoardGUI game)
Observer: Controls the flow of the game and updates the GUI of the game
post-conditions: Rolls the Dice of the Player P1 and then updates his pawn and call the methods Position_Setup, end_turn, Sunday_Match.

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn
P2 - the other player

end_turn

public static void end_turn(Player P1,
                            Player P2,
                            Pack_of_cards PoC,
                            Board BP,
                            BoardGUI game)
Observer:Ends the turn of the player whose playing
post-condition:Calls the turn_Player and calls is_Finished if the Players have finished the game.

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn
P2 - the other player

is_Finished

public static void is_Finished(Player P1,
                               Player P2)
Observer: Sees who won the game and displays it (will be called when both players have finished the game)
post-condition: Checks which Player has the most Money after they pay their Loans and Displays the winner

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn
P2 - the other player

Position_Setup

public static void Position_Setup(BoardGUI game,
                                  Player P1,
                                  Player P2,
                                  Pack_of_cards PoC,
                                  Board BP)
Observer: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player
post-condition: Makes all the Necessary Preparations before and after calling the Perform_Action of the Position of the Player (Moves the Cards to the Players hand, finds his new MovePosition, updates the Players, infoBox and Jackpot, throws the Cards from the Players hand to the Pile)

Parameters:
game - The GUI of the game
P1 - The Player that plays this turn
P2 - The other player
PoC - The Pack of Cards
BP - The Board with all the Positions

Sunday_Match

public static void Sunday_Match(Player P1)
observer: Asks the player if he wants to bet for a football match if he wins it he gains 500 euros else he loses 500 euros (this method is called only when in certain positions on the board)
post-conditions: Asks the Player P1 if he wants to bet, if he wins he 500 are added to his Money if he loses 500 are removed from his Money

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn

get_Loan

public static void get_Loan(Player P1)
Observer: Gives the Player a Loan of 1000 euros
post-conditions: Adds 1000 to the Loan and Money of the Player P1

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn

MyDealCards

public static void MyDealCards(Player P1)
Observer: Goes through the Players Deal Cards and Displays them.
post-conditions: Goes through the Players Deal Cards and calls the showDealCards to Display them.

Parameters:
P1 - the Player that plays this turn

shuffle

public static void shuffle(Pack_of_cards PoC)
Observer: Shuffles and put all the Cards from the Pile to the Main stack (Mail or Deal). (this Method is called only when one of the two stacks is empty)
post-conditions: Shuffles and put all the Cards from the Pile to the Main stack (Mail or Deal)

Parameters:
PoC - The Pack of Cards

rand

public static int[] rand(int size)
Observer: Crates a Array with random numbers from 0 to size-1 without any duplicates and then returns it.
post-conditions: Crates a Array with random numbers from 0 to size-1 without any duplicates and then returns it.

Parameters:
size - The size of the Array
Returns:
The Array with the random numbers

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
